reviewText: NBA Champions 2002 - 2007: San Antonio Spurs (3-Pack) As a Turkish customer, I'm disappointed to see that dvd's can be used only in region 1. So I think if I buy, it will be useless..
It was brand New....I bought as a birthday present for a friend and he loved it. It was in good condition when I bought it. I recommend this item :)

Perhaps I should have read the description better, but these DVDs aren't what I expected.  I expected to recieve DVDs containing the entire Spurs playoff series, instead these DVDs merely provide highlights of the Championship series.  Good material, but not what I was looking for.
